Review.Contenu: I just received my 33mm auto focus lens today.  I installed in to my Nikon Z7 II.  In general, it gets along with my Z7 II.  However, autofocus doesn't work properly all the time and occasionally it struggles to find the focus even though I used single point focus!  My Nikon lenses don't do that.One thing I noticed though, the information on the pictures read by iPhone shown 49mm instead of 33mm!  In my camera, it read 33mm!  Something weird! Also, if I set my camera to full auto mode, the lens settled at F2.8 only.  It won't go to F1.2 nor any other F-stop!  This is kind of interesting.  I could change it to F1.2 only if I use Aperture priority!Overall, the lens is well built and it does a decent job for close up pictures.  Auto focus needs some works for sure!  But for this price point, I can't complaint too much!

Review.Titre: Great lens to get cheap anamorphic
Review.Contenu: Great price, shipping was fast and easy, lens looks awesome!
Love it. The price is absolutely amazing, and the quality is just top. Thank you, I'm enjoying the cage kit for my S5II. 🇲🇽
Fast responses and shipment, products of quality. Highly recommended.

I bought the SIRUI Night Walker T1.2 S35 Cine Lens Series, and whenever I had questions and sent emails, the sales team responded promptly and addressed my inquiries. The product I ordered was delivered on schedule and met my expectations, just like it was described on their website. I'm eagerly looking forward to using it for all my projects. Thank you again!

Review.Titre: The quality and effort every employee…
Review.Contenu: The quality and effort every employee is willing to give for the demand of the customer! So many little details that make your filming life a flowing river. Even the delivery is excellent and fast. If I think what and how fast this company influenced the anamorphic filming word of hobbyists, "gearfantics" and pros. Unbelievable. Thank you, Sirui workers, and all the people at Sirui that make it possible!

The Sirui a200r is a fantastic light mat with a self-inflatable softbox saving time on set.I already own the a100b and use it all the time on film sets, so I immediately purchased the a200r for extra output and color flexibility. Fantastic light at a great price.

Review.Titre: The source for innovative affordable lenses~!!!
Review.Contenu: The innovative lenses & supports always expand my creativity.Their monopods are extremely versatile~~~I have used them to support light LED lights tucked into places that other supports wouldn't as quickly set up.Their lenses lend creative effects at affordable prices. I have always found their staff responsive and helpful.I eagerly await their next products~~~
Very easy buying online and fast shipping. Overall very happy with the service.Haven't tried the tripod yet.

Review.Titre: I didn’t try out actually the cinelens…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t try out actually the cinelens I order. I will do in some days after my holidays and back to work. I can’t wait for. In 6 days I received in Germany and the customer service reply immediately to my question. Really appreciate.

Review.Titre: Ordering online was efficient and easy
Review.Contenu: Ordering online was efficient and easy.  Tracking of the package was very thorough and timely.  Best of all, the monopod was everything that I expected it to be as well as per the Sirui website.

Review.Titre: The Sirui A100b balloon light is amazing
Review.Contenu: The Sirui A100b balloon light is amazingly innovative and well-designed. My compliments to the engineers at Sirui.The Sirui website was easy to order from and shipped the light quickly.
TripodReally happy with the tripod, looks sturdy and well build and will be using it for a long time
The products are characterized by high quality and a good price-performance ratio. Requests to support will be answered quickly.
Everything about my purchase was good, and excellent! Love the products!
Purchasing products from this website is easy, PayPal doesn’t work and it needs fix.
Great speed answering pre purchase questions and also speedy shipping when I did.
Fast delivery, good service with Fedex. The product fully meets my expectations!
Very accurate, delivery on time. Excellent quality product.
Easy to order.Good price.Speedy delivery.
Great service, product arrived fast and well packed. Thanks
Great quality product (monopod). Fast delivery.
Nice product. Delivered pretty fast
